name: 吳柏輝
objective:
本課程介紹各項節能減碳科技之原理與應用技術。本課程將講授通風與空調系統節能、冷凍系統節能、照明系統節能、能源管理系統、廢熱回收與熱泵系統節能應用，碳排放與碳足跡之計算，減碳原理與技術。
This course covers the fundamentals and applications of energy conservation and carbon reduction technology. This course introduce the conservation technologies of ventilation and air-conditioning systems, refrigeration system, lighting system, energy management systems, waste heat recovery and heat pump system; calculation of carbon production and carbon foot print, principles and technologies of carbon reduction.
